## National summary - based on reported cases


```{r, include = FALSE}
summary_tables <- 0
summary_figures <- 1
title_depth <- 3
index <- 1
region_path <- "covid-rt-estimates/national/cases/national"
show_title <- FALSE

interactive <- TRUE
standalone <- FALSE
```

```{r,  child = system.file("templates/_region-report.Rmd", package = "EpiNow2")}
```
